# RMDutil

## Installation

you can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Larsdegroot/RMDutil")
```
## Example

```{r}
library(RMDutil)
```

```{r}
data("data_covid")
```

```{r}
dim(data_covid)
```
